title: following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 

(Tosach Feidhme), 2023 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (tosach feidhme) 2023 ghairm den ordu seo

title: following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49
heading: 2. Ceaptar an 13ú lá de Mhárta 2023 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na forálacha seo
text_raw:
2. Ceaptar an 13ú lá de Mhárta 2023 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na forálacha seo 
a leanas d’Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Uimh. 49 de 2021) i 
ngníomh: 

(a) 

alt 2 (a mhéid nach bhfuil sé i ngníomh cheana féin); 

(b) 

alt 7; 

(c) 

alt 9; 

(d) 

alt 10; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

alt 11; 

alt 15; 

alt 18; 

alt 19. 

ARNA THABHAIRT faoi mo Shéala Oifigiúil, 

2 Márta, 2023. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Aire Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt 
agus Meán. 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 7 Márta, 2023, á rá go ndearnadh 
an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[90] 3 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 90 of 2023 

________________ 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2023 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [90] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 90 of 2023 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2023 

I, CATHERINE MARTIN, Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 20(3) of the 
Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021), hereby order as 
follows:
text_norm: 2 ceaptar 13u la de mharta 2023 mar la thiocfaidh na foralacha seo leanas acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (uimh 49 de 2021) ngniomh (a) alt 2 (a mheid nach bhfuil se ngniomh cheana fein) (b) alt 7 (c) alt 9 (d) alt 10 (e) (f) (g) (h) alt 11 alt 15 alt 18 alt 19 arna thabhairt faoi mo sheala oifigiuil 2 marta 2023 catherine martin aire turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 7 marta 2023 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo official translation tiontu oifigiuil 90 3 statutory instrument s.i no 90 2023 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2023 4 90 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 90 2023 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2023 catherine martin minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 20(3) official language (amendment) act 2021 (no 49 2021) hereby order follows

title: following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2023

title: following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49
heading: 2. The 13th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 13th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 
of 2021) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 2 (insofar as it is not already in operation); 

(b) 

section 7; 

(c) 

section 9; 

(d) 

section 10; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

section 11; 

section 15; 

section 18; 

section 19. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 March, 2023. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [90] 5
